players.name: Anna
players.description: Thin girl in glasses with her hair in a plait

rooms.name: bed room
rooms.description:
you are standing in a bedroom on the seccond floor
Two large floor to ceiling windows show countryside outside
You wish you could go out there, but the quarantine is in force

rooms.name: ensuite
rooms.description: The master bedroom's ensuite has a shower, toilet and sink, but not much of interest

rooms.name: hallway
rooms.description:
this white hallway stretches in front of you,
 it curves round to the right, and you can see the top of
 a slide where the stairs should be
 a door next to the slide leads to a small office

rooms.name: office
rooms.description:
This office is full of shelves of stuff, a large desk,
 a table with a 3d printer on it, and a hole cut into the floor
 with a ladder sticking out of it.

rooms.name: ballpit
rooms.description:
you slide down, and land with a splash in to a large ballpit!
 you had forgotten that was here

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description:
you clamber to the kitchen, it looks clean,
 but the floor could probably do with a mop
 A ladder extends upwards
 there is also a hatch leading to a ballpit,
 but you can't climb through it from this side
 all the parts for making a huel shake are out and
 the side is a bit powdery
